SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.gui

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.gui.MainMenu
public class MainMenu extends Object
Represents the main menu of the GUI. Manages the initialization and display of the main menu, including background and buttons.
